actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1685.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Assassinations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1685) Authorizes expenditures by the House Select Committee on Assassinations for personnel and other expenses incurred in its investigations. Limits such expenditures to $150,000 and prohibits their use for investigations of subjects which already are under consideration by other House committees.

titles.title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Assassinations.
